attributes.action: Dismiss the staff involved  in Baby P's case  from Harringay's council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is in support of sacking the social workers and head of department involved the case of Baby P, who despite 60 chances to save this abused baby failed to spot signs of abuse until eventually was killed in its own home. It is also a petition to have the doctor who did not spot the baby's broken back and ribs  be struck off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
